** start of index.html **

<!DOCTYPE html> 
<html lang="en"> 
  <head> 
    <meta charset="utf-8"> 
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title id="title">Lance Reddick Tribute Page</title> 
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="styles.css"> 
    </head> 
    <body>
      <main id="main"> 
        <h1 id="title">Lance Reddick Tribute Page</h1> 
        <p class="subtitle">1962 – 2023 • Actor, Musician, Role Model</p> 
          <div id="img-div"> 
            <img id="image" src="data:image/jpeg;base64," alt="Lance Reddick"> 
            <div id="img-caption">This is Lance Reddick.</div> 
            </div> 
            <div id="tribute-info">
              <h2>About Lance Reddick</h2> 
              <p> Lance Reddick was an American actor and musician best known for his powerful performances in <em>The Wire</em>, <em>Fringe</em>, and the <em>John Wick</em> films. Known for his deep voice, calm intensity, and dignified roles, he became a symbol of professionalism, resilience, and humility. Beyond acting, he was also a classically trained musician, reflecting his creative depth and discipline. </p> 
              <h3>Values He Showcases</h3> 
              <ul> 
                <li><strong>Discipline & Professionalism</strong> - He brought passion and integrity to every role.</li> 
                <li><strong>Humility</strong> - Admired for his kindness and respect toward colleagues and fans. </li> 
                <li><strong>Resilience</strong> - His career reflected determination and perserverance.</li> 
                <li><strong>Artistry</strong> - His talent extended from acting to music.</li> 
                <li><strong>Inspiration</strong> - A role model for young actors and creatives everywhere.</li> 
                </ul> 
                </div> 
                <p>Learn more about his life and career on his <a id="tribute-link" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lance_Reddick" target="_blank">Wikipedia page</a></p>
              </main> 
              </body> 
              </html> 

** end of index.html **

** start of styles.css **

body { 
  font-family: Arial, sans-serif; 
  margin: 0; 
  padding: 0; 
  background: #f4f4f9; 
  color: #333; 
  line-height: 1.6; 
  text-align: center; 
}

#title { 
  margin-top: 1rem; 
  font-size: 2.5rem; 
}

.subtitle { 
  font-style: italic; 
  color: #555; 
  margin-bottom: 2rem; 
}

#img-div { 
  margin: 0 auto; 
  padding: 1rem; 
  max-width: 600px; 
}

#image { 
  max-width: 100%; 
  height: auto; 
  display: block; 
  margin: 0 auto; 
  border-radius: 10px; 
  box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.2);
}

#img-caption { 
  margin-top: 0.5rem; 
  font-size: 0.9rem; 
  color: #555; 
}

#tribute-info { 
  max-width: 800px; 
  margin: 2rem auto; 
  text-align: left; 
}

#tribute-info h2, #tribute-info h3 { 
  color: #444; 
  border-bottom: 2px solid #ddd; 
  padding-bottom: 0.3rem; 
}

#tribute-info ul { 
  list-style-type: disc; 
  padding-left: 1.5rem; 
}

a { 
  color: #1a73e8; 
  text-decoration: none;
}

a:hover { 
  text-decoration: underline; 
}

** end of styles.css **
